casebody.data:
Lauren GOHL, AS NEXT FRIEND OF J.G., a Minor, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Sharon TURBIAK, Defendant-Appellant,
and
Dr. Randy Liepa, Candy Sokol, Shelly Moore, Nancy Respondek, Megan Sprow, Carol Debeaudry, Tracy Crews, and Diane Sloboda, Defendants-Appellees,
and
Cynthia Deman and Elizabeth Santer, Defendants. SC: 157946, 157947
COA: 335389, 335604 Supreme Court of Michigan. December 4, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the May 3, 2018 judgment of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the question presented should be reviewed by this Court.
